name: WormAttack
description:
The worm is on its way. There are blocks between you and him but he will get aoround those blocks if he can.

To delay his arrival destroy some blocks. It takes two hits each blocks - then you MUST destroy all parts of the worm before he reaches you.

CONTROLS

  • Arrow Keys - move left and right
  • A and D - move left and right
  • Mouse button - fire
